name: Fartrek
description:
REPAIR OR DIE ! 

Fart Trek is a cooperative 2 players game taking place into a spaceship. Randomly some breaches will pop somewhere on the hull, those breaches will progressively empty the oxygen present in the ship. To prevent this "Game Over situation", you'll have to eat beans in order to fly around the ship to repair the open breaches. Cooperation will be a key to successfully and rapidly repair the ship.

This game was game during Global Game Jam 2020.
